select p.id, p.title, p.image_path, p.original_price, p.current_price, p.reviews, p.rating from product p left join product_detail pd on p.id = pd.product_id where p.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or pd.description like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
